hotels.title: Banff Alpine Majesty in National Park with Two Golf Courses, Nine Restaurants & Onsite Bowling Alley
hotels.description: Experience the grandeur of the Canadian Rockies at this heritage retreat. This castle-like resort is a stunning blend of timeless elegance and natural beauty, offering guests an unforgettable experience. Explore the surrounding Banff National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site, with its pristine lakes, dense forests and serene alpine landscapes. For a truly memorable meal, visit the 1888 Chop House, where you can savour prime Alberta beef and fresh seafood, or the Waldhaus Restaurant to sample German-inspired delicacies. Alternatively, relax in the heated outdoor pool, indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the Fairmont Spa or challenge yourself on the renowned Stanley Thompson-designed golf course.
